chapter.title: Requirement
chapter.para: As mentioned in the introduction, we would like to build a robotic platform, but what is a robotic platform ?

For us, a platform represents a set of flexible robots, based on a common base, such as a common software, common electronics, standard tool holders, standards parts, etc. The gribot platform could, for example, allow the creation of a small mower robot, as well as a high clearance robot to work on mounds of crops.
This means that, in the long term, there will not be just one robot, but a family that, we hope, will allow great flexibility in working in agriculture.

In a first step, we will focus on a mower robot, allowing the maintenance of the grass in the crops, because it is a need that we quickly identified. However, as more needs are identified, or ideas emerge, we will document these needs.
